111.content:
Tommy started his day like normal and was picking at some dry cereal in his highchair with a bottle of milk. It was fine and fun until Grandpa gave this great big sneeze before he came in the kitchen.
Didi took one look at him and his red nose and said,<br>
"Pops, you get yourself back to bed."<br>
"Nonsense Didi I gotta watch the sprout while youre at school."
" I'm not having Tommy get sick again. You remember last time?"
"Oh and you think a school has less germs?" Grandpa grumbled. He at least have some soup in his chair but he was not going back to bed.
"Oh and Stu already lefT."Didi mused to herself "And Betty and Howard are out on vacation, and Chaz is at work-, well Tommy how would you like to come to school with Mommy?"
She smiled and already got his diaper bag together, missing the cool thumbs up her baby gave her with a big smile.
Soon he was buckled into his carseat and ready to go. Needless to say first hour with Mrs.Pickles was a little frazzled and distracting as Tommy had been set up in a playpen near her desk. It was home etc. But today's lesson was pretty simple: how to sew a button bacon on to something. Thankfully, Tommy was well-behaved in the pen and Didi had never been more glad he was such a good, quiet baby.
The bell rang for lunch and Did was about to get her meal out when a light knock was on her door.
"Oh Ramon, what are you doing here?" Didi asked "you dont have me this semester."
"Just stopin' by to say hey Mrs.Pickles." He smiled as he removed his sunglasses.
Almost instantly, the glim from the lenses and the cool leather jacket caught Tommy's attention.
"And I got a few questions..they might be a bit...personal."
"Oh Ramon if it;s something like that you really should ask Couch Cleamer," Didi said clearly getting flushed.
"Its not that," the teen quickly backtracked, his eyes a little wide with panic at the very idea, but they faded quickly as he calmed himself "do you know a Drew Pickles?" He asked, all he was hoping for was a phone number.

Tommy had been trying to get "Rocko" Ramons attention for a while and decided..

113.content:
It had started out to be a nice day for one year old Tommy Pickles quietly and happily playing in his playpen without any worries until she came Angelica Pickles,his evil three year old cousin who not only was the bossiest of the babies but pretended like she knew everything and was far smarter than all of them put together even though she didn't really know anymore than they did

"Hello Tommy!" She said in her mocking sweet voice pretending to be in a friendly mood for once "Whst are you doing today?"

"Hi Angelica! I'm just playing with my toys as usual once Chuckie and Phil and Lili come over we're all going to play in the big sandbox outdoors as usual and go for a ride in the wagon with Spike later on!" He announced proudly

"That's nice!" Angelica said yawning while shoving aside his toys so she can put down her prized possession:her doll Cynthia in the place where he would normally put his toy truck and glanced over at the kitchen where Tommy's mother Didi was busy making dinner "Hmmmm looks like I arrived just in time your Mommy's making dinner for you look she's even got some delicious blueberry pie for dessert!" Tommy looked up as she licked her lips

"Yeah I like to eat blueberry pie! It's one of my favorites!" At this Angelica got her usual mischievous,cruel expression on her face and pretended to look horrified

"Oh Tommy don't you know? You shouldn't eat blueberry pie!"

"What? But why not Angelica?" He asked curiously she pretended to be highly concerned

"Because silly if you do eat enough blueberry pie you'll turn into a big fat blueberry over time!" Tommy even at the tender age of one was stunned at this and he gibbered
"No that's not true Angelica! My Mommy's fed me blueberry pie plenty of times and never once did I turn into a blueberry you're lying!" He shouted

"Oh but Tommy you only ate small bites of blueberry pie! If you manage to eat the entire thing in one gulp you'll turn into a big fat blueberry yourself and you'll be stuck that way forever and forever!" She quietly snickered

"You're lying Angelica that's not going to happen!" Tommy shouted he may have only been one but he was no dummy Angelica shrugged

"Oh am I? Then I dare you to go out there and steal the blueberry pie from under your mother's nose and eat the whole thing up in one bite if you don't turn into a blueberry within a hour I'll never pick on you and the other babies ever again Scout's honor! But if you do then.....I'll have to say I hope you enjoy waddling around as a big fat blueberry for the rest of your life Tommy!" She folded her arms "Well what's it going to be are you a chicken Tommy like Chuckie or are you fearless,brave Tommy Pickles as you claim to be?" She laughed evilly what does he choose?
113.title: Tommy becomes a blueberry

choices: He managed to stop growing and changing for now
1131.content:
Despite his better judgement Tommy wasn't about to chicken out or be upstaged especially by Angelica of all people! So he bravely stood up and pulled the small handy screwdriver from his diaper pocket

"I'm not scared Angelica! I'll do it!" He cried easily unfastening the hatch of the baby playpen and quietly tiptoed over to where the delicious blueberry pie was at while Angelica snickered coldly "Dumb baby!" She muttered icily "They'll believe anything you say!"


It was all too easy and almost a everyday thing for Tommy to walk or crawl to his mother's side and her barely noticing but this time as she was chopping up lettuce and carrots she took a peek at her one year old son who was two inches away from the hot steaming pie and froze in his tracks like a deer cross in head lights

"Tommy my little angel! What are you doing?" She cooed if he were able to speak actual words he would have said "Nothing really mother." But instead he just grinned and his usual baby gurgle language Didi then turned back to chopping the lettuce and he quickly without pausing grabbed hold of his target and before she could look at him again stuffed the whole thing into his diaper compartment.

Once back in the safety of the playpen Angelica was both impressed and slightly disappointed good,angelic Tommy didn't get caught

"Humph some babies have all the good luck! Well congratulations Tommy you got the pie now eat it." Tommy stared at the steaming delicious blueberry pie now sitting at his feet for one hard minute could it be true? Would he actually turn into a huge,plump blueberry if he devoured the whole thing? Or could be another one of Angelica's usual tall fibs as always? She was completely filled with them him and Chuckie had had their shared experiences with them over the years but on the other hand who knows it might be fun and a new experience to be a blueberry! Phil and Lili were always exploring new things and were the most fearless babies he knew they would have jumped at the first chance to be big old fat blueberries! And he made his decision and instantly reached for the center piece of the pie pulling out a big chunk of it Angelica's eyes were wide and awestruck as she watched her cousin take a big gulp and swallowed the mouth full of pie then Tommy grabbed another piece and another soon there was nothing but blueberry goo all over his face and he was almost relishing in the act of devouring the tasty dessert practically shoveling in handfuls without need of a fork or spoon a half hour later.

Tommy lay on the ground of his playpen completely stuffed and his face and blue shirt smeared completely with pie while Angelica was still fuming

"Well Angelica I did it,I ate the entire pie and look I haven't changed into a blueberry yet!!" He said trying to pull himself up,his stomach now resembled a small beach ball and he could practically hear the gooey pie melting away in his tummy

"Hold your horses Tommy it's got to be for a whole hour,we got to wait for a hour before you turn into a blueberry!" She said still in utter shock he wasn't to eat the whole thing! Checking the clock on the wall which was ironic as she couldn't even tell time yet but soon enough a hour passed and Tommy was still in human form

"Well Angelica looks like a hour has passed and I'm still no blueberry."

"Ohh it's not fair!!" She pouted kicking his toy block stacks aside "You were supposed to turn into a big old blueberry! That's what my Mommy told me what happens to bad kids!"

Tommy was about to say I-told-you-so when all of a sudden he felt really funny and noticed he was putting on a little weight then he noticed the gooey sensation and scent of pie he was feeling digest in his tummy was changing into something else it was starting to feel like.......

"Uhhh Angelica I feel funny.....something's wrong with me!" He moaned

"Yeah,yeah just try and rub it in why don't you Tommy? You won the bet so........Oh My........." Angelica turned around and was in for the shock of her life as indeed Tommy Pickles was slowly turning into a big,fat blueberry his belly was swelling up to the size of a grapefruit and he felt nothing but blueberry juice in there and his face and skin was turning bright blue

"Angelica!! What's happening!!" He cried seemly unable to stand as his hands and feet were now too many sizes too small for him to use

"TOMMY YOU REALLY ARE TURNING INTO A BLUEBERRY!!" She cried out a bit frightened backing up "But I thought......it was a only a story......."

"Huh?" Was all he could say as he slowly continued to......

124.content:
"Okay Stu what do you have to show us this time?" Drew asked with arms fold and a bored expression on his face.

He and Chas were currently standing in his brother's garage to see his latest invention. Both were skeptical of the man creations which hardly ever worked but time and again they humored him with their presence.

Also in the garage were the babies; Tommy, Chuckie, Phil and Lil. They were in the spare playpen since Didi and Betty were out and they gave the men explicit instructions to watch over the little ones. Right now the four were standing by the railing, looking curiously at the three adults.

"What do you think they're doing?" Chuckie asked.

"I dunno, but my daddy said there was going to be a big surprise" Tommy replied with a smile.

"Oh I hope the surprise is cake" Phil said licking his lips.

"I hope its ice cream" Lil replied dreamily thinking of the frozen treat.

"That's way better, I hope its what you said" her twin said changing his answer.

"Shh, my daddy's talking" Tommy whispered.

"Gentleman I present to you Stu Pickle greatest invention" Stu said picking up a box that was lying on his workbench, turning and opening it with a flourish, "Behold the Youthenizer" he said proudly.

Looking at the object inside the two men saw a bright orange space ray gun toy with a yellow lightning bolt decal on the side. They both looked at it then each other before Drew gave his brother an unimpressed look, "Really a toy gun? That's your greatest invention?"

"Okay it may look like a child's toy right now but I needed something to cover and protect the fragile inner workings and this was all I had on short notice. But trust me when I say it works" Stu said with confidence.

"Well what does it do exactly?" Chas asked.

"I'll tell you what it does...absolutely nothing" Drew answered with a smirk.

The inventor frowned at the remark, "What it does is make a person physically younger through a focused burst of charged particles that change the subject cells back to their previous younger state" he explained before pulling out the toy gun and tapping the top, "I've included a dial here to select how many years to take off, ranging from one to ten. Currently it's set to take off one year of age."

"That ain't no cake" Phil huffed with a frown upon seeing it was just a toy.

"Or ice cream" Lil added.

"C'mon guys it may not be any of those things but it may still be fun" Tommy said in an optimistic tone.

"So you're saying that you're holding the fountain of youth right there in your hand" Drew summed up.

"Yeah...pretty much."

The man then started laughing, "Well forgive if I don't believe you."

"I thought you might feel that way so here's a free demonstration" Stu said before raising the Youthenizer and quicker then the eye could blink pulled the trigger firing off a green beam of light that hit Drew in the chest. Wasting no time he turned and fired off a shot that hit Chas in the same spot. Both felt a tingling sensation run throughout their bodies, suddenly feeling refreshed and invigorated. As for the babies they "ooo" at the light show they just witness happen.

Stu then raised the end of the toy gun up to his mouth and blew away the imaginary steam in trademark fashion.

"STU!" both shouted after realizing what their friend did.

"Relax you two and congratulations you're now one year younger" Stu said non nonchalantly.

"Well I do feel younger" Chas admitted after a while then looked himself over, "But I don't think I look it."

"Well of course you don't, it was just one year no one can tell if they're a year younger as there's hardly any difference" Stu face palmed, "Here I'll just adjust it to take five years off instead and then you'll see" he said as he reached for the dial with his hand.

"Um Tommy I'm getting a bad feeling about this" Chuckie told his friend with a nervous look.

"You always say that. It's fine Chuckie" Tommy replied with a smile.

Stu attempted to turn the dial past one only to find the darn thing was stuck and as he tried to move it he unconsciously began to step back. Unfortunately his foot landed on one of Tommy's blocks left there by accident, causing him to fall backwards. Out of instinct his finger pulled the trigger on the Youthenizer firing off a green beam of light that flew across the garage...and hit Chuckie right in the face.

Though there was no physical force the brightest of the flash dazed Chuckie causing him to fall backward onto his bottom, though he hardly felt it as a tingling sensation overtook his body. Reaching up to rub his eyes he found his glasses had fallen off, but when he tried to put them back on found they were now too big for him. Also his clothes felt loose and baggy on him as if he had somehow shrunk. And feeling his head his hair was no longer shaggy but short. Looking around he saw Tommy, Phil and Lil staring at him with shocked expressions.

"Guys? What's wrong?"

"I uh don't know how to tell you this Chuckie but uh..." Tommy began awkwardly, "You got younger."

"Yeah, you're like Tommy's age now" Phil said with Lil nodding her head.

"What?" Chuckie put his hands to his head, not wanting to believe what his friends were saying, "N-No that can't be..."

Despite wanting to deny it he knew they were telling the truth, and as the realization that he was a little...er littler baby dawned on him his emotions began to well up in the form of tear filled eyes. Without warning Chuckie began to bawl loudly at his unfortunate and strange predicament.

Meanwhile the sound of baby crying brought the two adults out of their shock at seeing one of the kids get regressed by Stu's invention. As for the inventor himself he was still lying where he had fallen on the floor, watching everything unfold with a terrified look already feeling his friends wrath at his literal slip up.

Rushing over to the playpen Chas quickly reached in and picked up the red haired baby.

"There, there Chuckie. It's gonna be okay daddy's here" he said gently rocking the crying boy to get him to calm down.

As he attempted to comfort his now one year old son Chas quickly became aware that Chuckie was...
124.title: Behold the Youthenizer

Looking down at her own diaper with a determined expression Angelica focused on trying to go potty. She bent her knees and balled her fists making it look like she was trying to go number two when in fact she didn’t care what she ended up doing so long as she used the crinkly garment. Her face turned a light red as after ten seconds with nothing happening she attempted to strain her infant muscles into letting go, but too no avail.

A full minute passed before the baby girl gave up the fruitless endeavor, her diaper remaining dry and clean.

“Guys, I tried but I just couldn’t go” she admitted with a frown.

Tommy then walked over in his slightly saggy diaper and patted her on the back reassuringly, “That’s okay Angelica, maybe you’ll end up going later.”

Chuckie came over to stand on her right and did the same adding, “Yeah, its not easy to go on the spot like that.”

Phil and Lil both remained where they were standing but gave their own words of encouragement.

Angelica smiled at all this, a look of happiness returning to her face as her whole body relaxed.

“Thanks you guys I real-“

She cut off mid-sentence as she felt a growing warmth in her crotch area and a quick look down revealed a yellow spot on the front her padding, just like Tommy’s. Realizing she had unconsciously started peeing Angelica said nothing and just stood there as she continued to do her business. It felt oddly satisfying to pee herself, the warm stream exiting her body only to be quickly absorbed by her diaper which became puffy with every drop. In her opinion the wetting ended way too soon leaving her in a warm yellow tinted and sagging garment taped around her waist.

“Look I did it, I wet myself on purpose” Angelica said excitedly, jumping up and down a little despite her soaked padding.

“Congrats Angelica” Tommy said.

“Yeah, I guess you are a baby now” Phil nodded, a bit stunned by her reaction.

“Darn right I’m a baby” she replied standing there proudly with both hands on her hips wearing her first wet diaper with apparent pride.

And Angelica truly meant it with her whole heart.
15111221211.title: It Takes Two To Tinkle

151112212111.content:
Didi entered and began to check their diapers.
On noticing Angelica and Tommy were wet, who did she change first?
151112212111.title: Didi comes to perform a diaper check

1511122121111.content:
“Uh oh, seems you two both need new diapers” Didi exclaimed as she lifted Tommy and Angelica out of the playpen, picking both up and holding one in each arm.

Tommy got her left arm and Angelica got her aunt’s right arm.

She then quickly carried them up the stairs and into Tommy’s nursery where the changing table awaited them both.

Instead of being placed on the padded table her aunt set her down on the floor before laying Tommy down. Apparently Tommy had the high honor of getting his diaper changed first, although might have to do with the fact that he is her son so thinking this Angelica didn’t get too jealous about being made second. However she was oddly peeved that she couldn’t see anything from where she was standing and begin to pull at Didi’s dress, getting her attention and eagerly pointing up where Tommy was.

Didi was puzzled by the behavior until she figured out what the baby girl wanted.

“Oh, do you want to watch me change your cousin. Okay, hold on” she said bending down to pick up the little one, setting her down on the table and off to the side, “There we go. Now don’t move while I change Tommy okay?” Didi ordered as if she thought she understood, unaware that she actually did.

Happy that she got what she Angelica behaved herself as she watched her aunt change Tommy’s diaper, idlily sucking her thumb as she did so. She didn’t know quite why she was wanted to see it happen. As a three year old Angelica hadn’t shown interest in this part of the babies lives, having found the daily ritual a bit gross. Maybe because she wore and used them too and now shared the same timely fate.

What Angelica didn’t know was that this fascination was mostly brought on by her developing a baby’s natural curiosity.

Regardless seeing another baby get their diaper changed while awkward, was also in a way kind of cool. Her aunt opened and removed the padding from Tommy’s rear leaving him naked and tossing the wet padding in the nearby pail. Next she wiped his area clean, getting his front good before adding some powder. Meanwhile Tommy giggled and kicked his legs in pleasure as all this happened, not minding that Angelica was watching nearby because as a baby he was used to having no privacy whatsoever. His mommy then pulled a new clean diapy from under the table and slid it under his bottom. Tommy smiled as she did up the yellow tapes on either side, securing him in the garment.

“Okay Tommy you’re all done. Now it’s a certain little angel’s turn” Didi announced moving her baby boy to the right to make room for her niece.

Angelica didn’t make a fuss as her aunt lifted her up and laid her down on the exact spot Tommy had been moments ago. She did however blush when the front of her diaper was pulled down between her legs, leaving her exposed in front of her cousin.

Tommy noticed this and immediately reassured the other baby, “Relax Angelica, its natural for us babies to be naked when we get diapy changes” he said.

Hearing this she quickly became calm again.

“Right, got it” she nodded.

After that short conversation the change went smoothly as Angelica just let go of any tension and allowed herself be cared for. Placing her arms behind her head she relaxed as she was wiped up, even going as far as to kick her legs and giggle like Tommy had done previously.

“Wow Angelica you’re really doing a great job of being a baby” Tommy commented on his baby cousin’s change.

“To be honest my daddy already changed me this morning” she admitted then added, “But I gotta say I’m loving the personalized service here. I never knew just how great diapies could be and how lucky you babies are to have them.”

Angelica was unaware of a certain babyish word she had used in that last sentence.

At this compliment Tommy simply shrugged, “It’s all we’ve ever known but we all agree that diapies are best!”

She then realized that at some point in the future she would have warned him and the other babies about the mistake of potty training.

As she was thinking quietly to herself about how much as she had changed in such a short time, ironically while she was getting her diaper changed, Angelica realized there was one change she wanted to make for herself. And considering what it was she figured it was better to do sooner rather than later.

“Hey Tommy?” she asked.

“Yeah, what is it Angelica?”

“I want you and the other babies to call me Angel from now on” Angelica stated.

She figured since she had a new life as a baby she should also have a new name, one that didn’t sound so grown up so she went with the nickname her daddy and auntie were calling her.

“Okay if that’s what you really want then Angel it is” Tommy replied with a smile liking the name change.

It also kinda fit given that she was acting a lot nicer to them.

After the new dubbed “Angel” was powdered and taped up in a new diapy the duo were then swiftly picked up by Didi who carried them back downstairs and placed back in the playpen. After she left Tommy announced Angelica’s new name to the others; Chuckie, Phil and Lil all nodding in agreement that it was better than her old one. However Chuckie said that he’d only call her Angel if she stopped calling him “Finster”, pointing out that she had already started calling Tommy “Tommy” instead of “Pickles”. Angel apologized and agreed to the other baby’s terms.

With all that out of the way the now official ‘five’ babies then decided to do what?
1511122121111.title: An Angel Get Her Diaper Changed

15111221211111.content:
“Hey now that Angelic-sorry I mean Angel’s one of us we should go on an adventure with her” Lil spoke up after a while.

“That’s a great idea Lil” Tommy commended his fellow baby with Chuckie and Phil nodding in approval.

“Ooo, let’s do that” Angel agreed excited at the prospect of doing something together with her new pint-sized pals.

“Yeah but what should we do?” Chuckie pointed out.

Realizing that they were back to square one the babies went back to scratching their heads and thinking.

Turning to face his cousin Tommy asked, “What would you like to do Angel? It’s your first adventure so you should get to decide what we do.”

Angel was surprised he turned to her for this big decision since she knew that he was the lead baby of the group but welcomed the offer nonetheless.

“Me? Gee I dunno…let me think some more” she admitted having drawn a blank for the past couple of minutes.

Resting her chin on the palm of her tiny hand Angel concentrated on figuring this out. It should have been simple given that she was great coming up with plans and ideas, though those had previously been to take advantage of or mess with the babies. After some thought she realized that the problem that she was trying to think of something big for their first group outing.

Just when Angel thought she’d end up using her diaper before coming up with something she made a decision.
15111221211111.title: Angel's First Baby Adventure

151112212111111.content:
"I got it. Let's try about getting some cookies." She told them.

"Great idea."
That came from Phil.

"Yeah, not sure why, but I seem to like them." Angel commented.

She remembered she'd liked them as Angelica, and was sure she'd like them as Angel.

How do they attempt to get them after getting out of the playpen?
151112212111111.title: Get cookies from the kitchen

choices: Started to show signs of waking up
1511122121111111.content:
“But how are we going to get them. They’re so high up” Chuckie bemoaned, “It’s impossible.”

“Aww Chuckie don’t be such a downer” Tommy replied turning to look at his cousin, “Besides I’m sure Angel knows a way to get them, dotcha?”

“I do, I use to sneak cookies by climbing on top of a chair to get at them. Though I was a big kid at the time so I don’t know if I can do it now that I’m a baby and littler” she said with obvious doubt and concern.

“What if we help lift you up?” Phil proposed and Angel found herself nodding along. “That might actually work. I know I used to call you guys dumb babies but you’re actually smart babies” she admitted with a smile. Hearing the compliment Phil beamed with pride until his sister Lil spoke up. “Well Phil does his moments” she said with a giggle causing her twin to respond with a “Hey!”

Angel, Tommy and Chuckie shared a small laugh at their friend’s antics.

“Alright let’s go get those cookies” Tommy announced as he went over to the giant teddy bear in the corner of the playpen, reaching under it retrieve his trusty screwdriver. The other four babies gathered behind him as he flipped the latch and opened the gate. Then as a group they left the playpen and began making their way toward the kitchen with everyone crawling on all fours. In the lead was Tommy with Angel behind him, followed by the twins Phil and Lil with Chuckie bringing up the rear. Being the most nervous of the group he always went last by choice.

When they reached the back of the couch Tommy paused in his crawling to address his friends.

“Guys we’ll have to be very quiet cause my Mommy’s taking a nap” he said in low voice and turning to look at the couch Angel saw her Aunt was indeed asleep, lying with her hands folded across her chest and head tilted back as she snored softly.

“That’s good” Angel whispered back, “It means we don’t have to crawl to sneak around.”

Although she had to admit crawling around was really fun to do.

Tommy nodded then stood up with everyone doing the same, the five quickly making the rest of the trip across the living room on foot. Upon reaching and stepping onto the titled kitchen floor Angel looked around in awe only for her cousin to quickly grab her attention by asking her a question.

“Okay Angel what should we do?”

“You’re asking me?” she questioned in surprise.

“Yeah you know the most about this stuff, and it is your first adventure and all so you should be the one in charge” Tommy nodded with a smile.

She simply nodded appreciatively at the offer of leadership, “Okay…um well we need to move one of those chairs from the table over to the counter where the cookie jar is” Angel said pointing first to the chair then to the counter. At this point Chuckie decided to voice his own opinion, “Uh guys, I’m starting to think this isn’t such a good idea. Let’s just go back and forgot about doing this” he said while fiddling nervously with his fingers.

Angel then shared a look with Tommy before whispering quietly to him behind her hand, “Is Chuckie always like this?”

“Yeah, but you get used to it” he replied with a shrug.

“Listen Chuckie why don’t you keep watch in case my mommy wakes up and we’ll get the cookies” he told his less than brave friend. “Okay, I can do that” the red head answered before rushing off to do his assigned task, taking a spot by the kitchen doorway.

With that taken care of the other four babies proceeded to implement Angel’s plan and working together as one managed to push a chair over to the cookie jar. Once it was in place Phil and Lil helped Angel and Tommy climb up onto the chair since they couldn’t do so by themselves, the entire time they were doing this the rugrats imagining that they were robbing a bank and trying to steal the delicious treasure from the safe while the guard napped nearby. Since was a baby now too she was also able to immerse herself in the fantasy along with the rest of the babies.

However now came the moment of truth as Angel reached for the jar with her tiny hands and short arms. Stretching them as far as they would go she was able to grab the top of the jar and with a pull tipped the whole thing on its side, knocking the lid off but still keeping it on the counter. Immediately sticking her hand inside she pulled out one of the brown flat circles, holding it up in victory.

It was only seconds later she realized a problem she hadn’t considered.

“Uh, Tommy? How are we going to carry the cookies?”

The other baby simply chuckled, “Easy. Just put them in your diapy Angel” he replied before reaching into the jar, grabbing a cookie and sticking it down the front of his diaper.

“Oh…” was all she said before following her cousin’s lead and proceed to stuff cookies one by one down her own padding, trusting the other enough not to question the babyish action and just go with it.

Meanwhile as his friends were busy pilfering the cookie jar Chuckie continued to keep look out on Tommy’s sleeping mommy.

As it turned out Didi…
1511122121111111.title: The Great Cookie Heist

choices: Yes, but it wound up crumbling.
15111221211111111.content:
Didi seemed to be a heavy sleeper, as she didn't seem to hear a thing.

Soon, they returned to the playpen, none the wiser, Chuckie coming in last.
Angel then shared the cookies, even trying to break one into pieces for the others, but was she able to do so?
15111221211111111.title: Continued sleeping uninterrupted

151112212111111111.content:
She managed to easily break the cookie into five smaller pieces, all of equal size before handing one to each of the other babies who all immediately stuck the tasty treats in their mouths. Chuckie, Phil and Lil were able to lightly chew and nibble on theirs given they had a few teeth in their mouths. Tommy on the other hand had to nom on his cookie since he still didn't have any teeth yet. Despite this her cousin still enjoyed the sweet snack as evidenced by the smile on his face and the 'mmm' sounds he made. Looking at the rest of the group Angel could seeing them having similar reactions to the heavenly joy that was eating a cookie.

Eating her own piece she instantly smiled at the delicious chocolaty taste and crunchiness, her eyes becoming half lidded as she savored every wonderful second. All too quickly it was gone leaving behind a sweet aftertaste and the craving for more.

She started to reach for another cookie to break apart for them to eat when her Aunt Didi started to stir on the couch. Realizing that they only had seconds before she would wake up and see the stolen sweets Angel slightly panicked.

"Uh oh guys, we have to hide the cookies. Like right now" she said quickly.

"Should we put them back in our diapies?" Phil questioned as Tommy and Lil made to reach for the cookies whilst holding open the front of their diapers.

"No that won't work because Tommy's mommy might check us and find them" Angel pointed out causing the two babies to stop what they were doing and let the waistbands of their padding snap back into place.

"Then where should we hide them?" Chuckie asked.

"I'm thinking..." she replied as she quickly surveyed the playpen for a good temporary hiding spot for the cookies.

The first thing Angel saw that she assumed would do the trick was...
151112212111111111.title: Sharing With Friends

1511122121111111111.content:
"The toybox."
"It might work." Tommy told her.
All hid the cookies under various toys inside the toybox as best they could, before returning to the playpen.

It was still Angel's turn for an adventure, but, what did she decide they all should do next?
1511122121111111111.title: Toy Box

15111221211111111111.content:
(Imagination adventure coming up. Also this story takes place before Chuckie potty trains so he’s in diapers still along with the other rugrats)


This time Angel came up with an idea for an adventure quicker than the last time. But instead of saying it aloud she first toddled over to the toy chest to pull out a familiar green reptile.

“We should play Reptar” she announced proudly while holding up Tommy’s toy Reptar.

The lizard monster was one of the few common interests she had shared with the babies as her older self. That being said it was no surprise when everyone enthusiastically cheered upon hearing her idea, both Phil and Lil saying “Yeah, let’s play Reptar!”

“Great idea Angel. We haven’t played Reptar in a while” Tommy said smiling in approval.

“But who gets to be Reptar this time?” Chuckie asked right away.

“Not Tommy that’s for sure” Phil replied with folded arms.

“Yeah, he always gets to be Reptar and that’s not fair” Lil agreed with her brother.

Not taking offense to the twins words Tommy nodded, “Alright, alright we’ll pick someone other than me to be Reptar. Chuckie what about you, do you wanna be Reptar?” he asked his best friend.

Chuckie flustered at the question nervously replied, “I d-don’t know Tommy. If I was Reptar I’d have to always be fighting those scary giant monsters all the time.”

“Aww c’mon Chuckie that’s what’s so cool and fun about being Reptar” Phil countered.

“Plus you can smash lots of buildings and not get in trouble” Lil added.

“Sorry guys but I just don’t think its such a good idea if I do it” he answered with a sigh.

Tommy walked over and give his friend a comforting pat on the back, “That’s okay Chuckie you don’t have to be Reptar if you don’t want to.” He then looked over at Angel, “What about you Angel, do you want to do it?”

Phil then excitedly raised his hand, “Ooo if she doesn’t want to do it can I be Reptar?”

Lil then raised her own hand, “No pick me, I really wanna be Reptar.”

Seeing the twins both wanting the honor of playing the lizard monster Angel suddenly felt self conscious about taking the part.

“Gee Tommy, I don’t know. I actually wish there was a way we can all be Reptar” she honestly said.

He could see where she was coming from and silently pondered this conundrum when he had an idea.

“Maybe we can…” Tommy said causing the others to get looks of confusion, even Angel.

“Whaddya mean Tommy. There’s not way we can all be Reptar” Chuckie smartly pointed out.

“True, but we can be like Reptar. What if he was our daddy and we were his babies?” he proposed to his friends.

“That actually sounds pretty cool” Angel agreed, right away liking her cousin’s idea with Chuckie, Phil and Lil apparently feeling the same judging by they said next.

“Reptar as our dad would be sweet” Phil said after some thought.

“He’d probably be a real nice daddy to us and do things like feed us, play with us and change us” Lil added happily.

“And he could protect us from the big bad monsters of the world too so we’d never have to worry” Chuckie replied with a smile, very glad at not having to worry about danger of any kind.

“You’re absolutely right Chuckie that’s why Reptar took all of us to a secret island where we would be safe” Tommy narrated the beginning of their tale.

Angel then felt her young imagination begin to run wild at her cousin’s words as the world begin to change before her very eyes, becoming exactly what she envisioned in her mind. Suddenly she found herself in a large roomy nursery-like cave lit up by glowing lava flows that she automatically knew was inside a large mountain on a beautiful tropical island. Looking around she saw that she was in a stone playpen along with Tommy, Chuckie, Phil and Lil. The five of them now looked like Reptar only much smaller and they still had their hair and babyish attire (basically they look like they did in Reptar 2010 but only half as big as they were portrayed).

Her short blonde hair was done up in pig tails and bows with her pink dummy bear shirt and diaper fully on display. Tommy still bald wore his blue shirt and like her a fully visible diaper. Chuckie with his messy red hair sported his purple glasses and oddly yellowed colored shorts. Phil wore his blue overalls and Lil had her blue dress out from under which peeked a bit of her diaper. All in all nothing much changed other than the fact the five of them were now big green scaly lizard monsters and now had an even bigger scaly lizard monster as their daddy.

Speaking of which they all turned their heads to the cave entrance as they heard thunderous footsteps approaching from the outside. Seconds later the one and only Reptar strode into the cave nursery and headed over to stone playpen before looking down at them with a toothy grin. Despite being slightly less than half Reptar’s size they didn’t feel at all threaten or nervous at the sight of the big monster.

“Hey there little ones, daddy’s home now” he greeted them with a joyous smile.

What followed next Angel could only describe as the best time of her life as they all played with their new daddy, having fun with games of hide and seek as well as tag. Afterwards they were all placed into highchairs and fed which resulted in a few messy lizards that needed cleaning up. Actually it was double given the fact that after lunch she, Phil and Chuckie ended up wetting their diapers and needing a change. As she was being cleaned up, her change having taken place last, Reptar sniffed at the air as he detected a foreign scent other than his daughter’s pee. Realizing that there was an intruder on the island he quickly rediapered Angel and told his children to stay in the cave before leaving.

Upon reaching the nearby beach he saw that the intruder was none other than his arch enemy Robo Snail.

“After months of searching I finally found you” the purple snail announced smugly.

“Robo Snail I don’t know why you’re here but you have thirty seconds leave before I make you” Reptar growled, punching his fists together in anticipation of a fight.

What Reptar didn’t know was that his curious children had ignored his order and were watching the scene unfold from nearby behind some trees. They right away saw the giant evil snail and were instantly excited to see their father beat up the overgrown shellfish and save the day as always.

Little did they know that the mechanical snail had a trick up his sleeve.

“Oh I doubt you’ll be able to be me this time around Reptar” Robo taunted.

“And why is that?” Reptar derisively snorted.

“Because this time I have this!” Robo said before removing a weapon hidden inside his shell.

“What is that thing?”

Robo simply smirked at the green reptile.

“Why it’s a…”
15111221211111111111.title: Reptar Rugrats

choices: The now 'six' baby reptars leave to foil Robo Snail's plan
151112212111111111111.content:
“Why it’s a youth gun Reptar” Robo snickered.

“A youth gun?” Reptar scratched his head confusingly, “And what’s that supposed to do?”

“Why it makes things younger my reptilian friend. Here I’ll give you a first-hand demonstration” the purple snail then laughed manically before aiming and firing a blue beam of energy at the green dinosaur, nailing the lizard right in his chest. Reptar became afraid as he suddenly found himself growing smaller and everything around him growing bigger, including his arch-enemy. His fear turned to embarrassment as he felt a thick white diaper materialize around his waist and he quickly tried to cover it with his claw like hands, looking quite cute and adorable in the process.

Meanwhile Tommy, Angelica and the other baby reptars were all shocked to see their big strong daddy suddenly reduced to their size and age. Though they wanted to help their father the sight of the regression scared them enough that all five babies remained where they were.

Robo then chuckled as the came closer to his toddler foe, Reptar taking a step backward as the snail now seemed to tower over him due to his smaller body. The difference in height paralyzed the tyke with fear and Reptar froze up.

“Well now I say that was easier than I thought. I’m so glad I stole this thing from those top secret scientists, it finally helped me put you in your place you overgrown lizard…or should I now say baby lizard” he taunted with another laugh.

Hearing that made Reptar angry the young dino shaking off his fear as he attempted to punch and claw at the snail. However Robo simply batted away the feeble strikes with one claw and roughly shoved the baby backward causing Reptar to land on his padded bottom. While falling down didn’t hurt so much thanks to his diaper the painful shove caused his regressed emotions to rise to the surface in the form of teary eyes and light sniffling.

“Aww is little baby Reptar gonna cry” Robo sneered down at the toddler, absolutely loving every moment of his nemesis’s regressed torment.

Reptar not wanting to give his enemy the satisfaction somehow managed not to do so…that is until the baby reptile let out a muffled but still audible fart and felt the seat of his diaper become heavier. The realization that he had just pooped himself ended up breaking the dino’s resolve and seconds later he was bawling his eyes into both hands. Seeing the mighty Reptar crying was sweet Robo would admit but the real icing on the cake was the fact that the baby dinosaur was crying because he had messed his diaper. The snail would have relished the victory a bit longer had the foul stench coming from Reptar’s padding not reach his nose.

Waving a claw in front of his face Robo spoke, “Well Reptar I’d love to stay and tease you for being a dirty dinosaur heh. But I’ve got other places to be, namely taking over the world which will be a cinch taking to this bad boy right here.” He paused to wave the youth gun for emphasis, “That and I don’t do diapers if you know what I mean. But don’t worry I’m sure someone will come change you…eventually” the snail cackled evilly before turning around and heading for the open ocean. The moment he reached the water his trends transformed into pontoons and he sped off into the distance.

Seeing that Robo Snail was gone and the coast clear the babies quickly made their way over to their baby father who was now lying on his back, the baby dinosaur kicking his arms and legs as he continued his crying tantrum. Because Reptar was crying so loudly the five of them were forced to cover their ears.

“How are we going to get him to stop crying?” Angel shouted over the wailing.

“We got to calm him down somehow” was Tommy’s response.

“Ooo I know what always calms me down” Lil replied before reached into her pocket and pulling out a pacifier, “Here, daddy can borrow my binky” she said before promptly putting in the crying lizard’s maw. Instantly the loud crying stopped as Reptar took notice of the rubber nipple in his mouth. He gave it a few tentative suckles before sucking on it as the rhythmic motion of the pacifier soothed and comforted the distraught reptile. However finding himself surrounded by his children in the bizarre situation he was in made him nervous and kept him from feeling at ease. His full diaper didn’t help matters and he kicked his legs in response to the sensation.

“Nice going there Lil” Tommy congratulated his friend, the others doing the same.

Lil proudly smiled at the praise placing her hand on her hips.

“So what are we going to do now?” Chuckie asked right away

The five babies scrunched their noses as the stinky odor hit their noses at almost exactly the same time. Reptar merely squirmed and kicked his legs as he was uncomfortable still being in his soiled padding

Tommy noticed this and made the call by saying what he said next.

“Uh…I think we’re going to need to change our daddy’s diapie” he stated with uncertainty.

“What?”

“Nuh uh, no way”

“Eww gross”

Tommy expecting those kind of responses replied, “Guys we have to change him. There’s no other way.”

“Tommy we’re babies we don’t change, we get changed” Phil pointed out with crossed arms.

“Yeah and daddy’s a baby now which means he one of us. And besides don’t you remember how nicely he cared for us and played with us” he reminded the others of Reptar’s good parenting; Phil, Lil and Chuckie all growing thoughtful at Tommy’s words.

“Tommy’s right. Reptar-er daddy has always changed our diapers and now its our turn to return the favor, no matter how stinky it may be” Angel rallied coming to her cousin’s defense.

Pumped at the duo’s combined statements the three changed their minds and agreed to changing their father’s diaper. Meanwhile Reptar who had been listening the entire time and understood every word they said since he was a baby now smiled gratefully at his kid’s desire to help him.

Under Tommy’s orders Phil and Lil ran back to the cave and retrieved the diaper bag bringing it back to the beach. Unzipping it they laid out the necessary supplies on the ground before collectively turning to face Reptar who looked up at them through the empty space between his legs. The babies eyed the large bulge in the back of their father’s diaper before steeling their resolve and setting to work. Tommy and Angel ripped the tapes on either side free causing the padding to fall open. Not looking inside and plugging their noses Phil and Lil removed the dirty diaper and quickly balled it up with help from Chuckie who then carried it to the trash and disposed of it. With that out of the way everyone then grabbed a handful of wipes and jointly cleaned the baby lizard’s rear end of the leftover mess. In response Reptar ended up giggling and kicking his legs a little at the ticklish sensation of being wiped, now seeing why his kids loved it so much when he changed them. He even continued to do so after his bottom was clean and he was being powdered. In no time at all it seemed he was quickly dressed in another diaper and was standing up. Despite having his own children change his diaper Reptar had found the experience to be more fun than weird.

Pulling the pacifier out of his mouth with a pop Reptar addressed his kids with an awkward and sheepish smile, “Um, thanks for changing me kids.”

“Aww you’re welcome daddy” Tommy replied speaking for the group.

Reptar scratched the back of his neck, shifting nervously from foot to foot causing his diaper to crinkle, “About that…I don’t think ‘daddy’ suits me anymore, at least until I get turned back into an adult” he admitted with a frown.

“Nonsense, you’ll always be our daddy even if you’re baby” Tommy told the other toddler.

“In fact being one of us actually makes you cooler” Angel said with a smile.

“Really? You think of me as one of you?” Reptar couldn’t help but grin, his tail wagging a little in happiness at the acceptance he was being shown.

“Yeah and now that you are you can really play with us” Phil pointed out.

“And drink from bottles” Lil added.

“And take long naps” Chuckie added.

“And wear and use diapies just like we do” Tommy finished with a flourish.

Reptar blushed at Tommy’s statement and looked down at his own padded garment. Reaching down he gripped the waistband of his diaper and adjusted it a little bit, “Well I do admit they are comfy and convenient for when I gotta go potty” he replied his blush deepening at his choice of words.

Hearing their father speak like that the five gave each other knowing smiles and a nod before moving to embrace the newest baby in big group hug. Reptar tensed for a moment then relaxed as he hugged his kids back, no longer feeling so much a parent as he did a fellow playmate.

info.brief_description: Join Your favorite baby from Rugrats as They hang on to their diapies for adventures!
info.description:
There are a some rules that You must obey.

1. keep it clean.
2. Diaper changes are allowed.
3. Nothing rude.
4. Every chapter must be appropriate.
5. Their must never be a mean chapter or it will be deleted.
6. This is the only way the story can stay alive.
7. No Weight gain.
8. If you want to Have the characters get age regressed, You must have excellent grammar with details.
9. No age Progression.
10. Potty training is allowed as well as alternate episodes that must appropriate.
11. The Rugrats can remove their clothes only if they take a bath or go nakie like in Naked Tommy. But, that must never be inappropriate.
12. Have fun!
